extendedInfo.description: Stay up to date in the world of Android with Android Authority. reviews.title: Excellent content
reviews.comment: Fantastic ,precise and detailed news with anything related to Android. Highly recommended.  Kudos guys.
reviews.author: sushan shetty

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: Its one of the best android news apps I have ever used. The only issue that I have come across is that for some articles, the pictures cannot be accessed. Sometimes this means clicking on a picture only shows you the first of many pictures only, and other times this means that clicking on a picture does nothing but show you a revolving circle on the picture that doesn\'t do anything. Besides that, this app works very well!
reviews.author: Zeshan Choudhry

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I probably would have given it 5 stars if it hadn\'t crashed the first time it asked me to rate it
reviews.author: Michael Morgan

reviews.title: Best app design till now
reviews.comment: I have used quite a few android sites apps.. They all have very specific boring structure.... But this app is a class. Very fast, super slick design, font used is very nice...
reviews.author: vishal botre

reviews.title: Best info app period.
reviews.comment: These guys rock. They\'re helpful and insightful. Before I make any future Android related purchases. I\'ll check on Android Authority first..
reviews.author: Rey Davila

reviews.title: Top Notch!
reviews.comment: Up to the minutes. Always dead on. Nice work.
reviews.author: Rodney Cranford

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Super good but you guys repeat one news several times
reviews.author: Deepak Dulal

reviews.title: Great app! Eh widget
reviews.comment: The app works great and is probably my favorite android news app. My only gripe is that the widget is pretty weak. I\'m not saying it should copy Android Centrals widget, but it should take away strong qualities from it. Having multiple articles shown at once and being able to scroll through them is a lot easier and better looking in my opinion.
reviews.author: Ryne Sorensen
